name: Elemental Dragon
description:
Elemental Dragon, a game for Gueim BCN Jam by Andrés Ruiz and David Boada.

Unfortunately, the game is unfinished and full of bugs! It was my first game jam, but I had a great time. It was fun as hell! :D


Protect both the Ice and Fire crystals from golems!


Controls:

z - Switch field

x - Shoot fire

c - Shoot ice
